DOC.brief_title: Protease Inhibitors Combined Oral Contraceptive Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics
DOC.criteria: HIV positive Female Age 1845 Using follow medication regimen : ARV medication , entry inhibitor , nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor ( NRTIs ) , integrase inhibitor , CCR5 agonists . Acceptable NRTI combination include zidovudine ( ZDV ) , lamivudine ( 3TC ) , emtricitabine ( FTC ) , didanosine ( ddl ) , stavudine ( d4T ) , abacavir ( ABC ) , tenofovir disoproxil fumarate ( TDF ) Ovulatory ( midluteal progesterone > 3ng/dL ) Not plan conceive study period Willing abstain grapefruit product If take ritonavir , willing use alternate nonhormonal contraception BMI < = 40 Able consent English Spanish No change medication regimen least 21 day prior study entry plan change study period CD4 > =200 , and/or consider profoundly immuncompromised primary HIV provider Using combination ZDV d4T Platelets < 50,000 AST ALT > twice upper limit normal Bilirubin > twice upper limit normal Use CYP3A4 induce inhibit medication Pregnant breastfeed last 30 day Use DepoProvera last 180 day Use hormonal contraception last 30 day Undiagnosed vaginal bleeding invasive cancer reproductive tract > 50 % change tobacco use last month Initiation titration methadone therapy last month Uncontrolled thyroid disease Contraindication estrogen use Inability comply study protocol
